thread.section_title: Quicken Loans Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Quicken Loans | www.quickenloans.com | 4 of 282
thread.title: satisfied customer
thread.title_full: Quicken Loans reviewed by satisfied customer

author: satisfied customer
title: satisfied customer
text: Great job...especially Brian...we started this trip just about a year ago, until you guys sarted giving me different agents, for diifferent phases in my loan process..he stood with me the whole way...after that it started to get a little cloudy...as i mentioned in a previous survey,the changing of the loan agents sort of threw me off.But all in all..my experience with the company was decent.
